alert.note: Alert for Kearny; Lane; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 2:58AM CDT until March 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030...044 AND 062... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning For wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM CDT this evening. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 030 Trego...Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane and Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Timing...This afternoon and Evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 70s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
